sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - ஒடிப்போய்விடு, பரிதபி, அலைந்துபோ, அலை, புலம்பு, பறந்துபோ, அங்கலாய். ஓடு, அசை, அகற்றிவிடு, அலைகிறவனாயிரு, துக்கித்துப்புலம்பிக் கொண்டிரு. துலுக்கு அலையப்பண்ணு, பேர்த்துப் போடப்படு
to shake, to waver, to wander, to move to and fro, to flutter, to show grief, to have compassion on
1) to move to and fro, to wander (aimlessly), to take flight
3) to waver, to wave, to shake
4) to show grief, to lament, to condole, to show sympathy
2) to make a wagging, to wag (with the head)
1) to move oneself to and fro, to sway, to totter

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to nod, that is, waver; figuratively to wander, flee, disappear; also (from shaking the head in sympathy), to console, deplore, or (from tossing the head in scorn) taunt: - bemoan, flee, get, mourn, make to move, take pity, remove, shake, skip for joy, be sorry, vagabond, way, wandering.
Cognate: H4493, H5110, H5112, H5113, H5205
